mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id AS userId, c.product_id AS productId, c.quantity, p.product_name AS productName, p.price AS price, p.image_url AS imageUrl FROM Bg_Cart c LEFT JOIN Bg_Product p ON c.product_id = p.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Bg_Cart (user_id, product_id, quantity) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Bg_Cart WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
